forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: home button

comments.text: the home button is at the top-left of the main dialog, and takes you back to your home area.
you can also make your home area private by clicking to the area (mountain icon) dialog, then "...", then "private". also see [-> private areas]
you can make any area you created your home, by clicking "..." and "make my home" from the area dialog.

thread.latestCommentText: you can make any area you created your home, by clicking "..." and "make my home" from the area dialog.
